---@class BattleRenderContext
local BattleRenderContext = SimpleClassUtil:class()

function BattleRenderContext:initialize()
   ---@type BattleRenderSystemContext
   self._system_context = BattleRenderSystemContext:new()
   ---@type BattleRenderEntityContext
   self._entity_context = BattleRenderEntityContext:new()
end
---@param battleManager PVE_Config_Battle_Manager
function BattleRenderContext:init(blackBoard,battleData,battleManager)

   self._entity_context:init(blackBoard,battleData,battleManager)

   self._system_context:init(self._entity_context._list_camp)
end

function BattleRenderContext:update(dt)
   if self._entity_context then
      self._entity_context:update(dt)
   end
end

return BattleRenderContext
